course_description: This elective is recommended for students interested in gait rehabilitation or in neurologic physical therapy specialty practice. Students will learn advanced skills and clinical reasoning associated with assessment and intervention, as well as gain experience with technologies and equipment used for treatment of people with neurologic gait dysfunction. This course will be structured utilizing a clinical decision-making approach. Special attention will be given to both theory and practice, with a focus on current evidence-based medicine.
